title: Cuban guacamole summer salad
ingredients: ['1 iceberg lettuce', '1 tomato, sliced into wedges', '75g sweetcorn', '2 hearts of palm, sliced into discs', '1 small red onion, sliced into rings', '130g borlotti beans', '1 avocado, mashed', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '1/2 teaspoon Goya® Sazon Completa', '1/2 teaspoon Salsa aji Nativo®', '1 tablespoon mayonnaise', '1 hard boiled egg, chopped', '1 tablespoon lemon juice', '2 tablespoons red wine vinegar', '1 teaspoon American mustard', '2 tablespoons oil', '1 tablespoon finely ground sea salt', '1/2 teaspoon brown sugar']
